name: If immediateClose is true, directBankingDiallerFlag must be false

testSteps.description: Given I logged into the API earlier
And I have confirmed a Customer with a cif Key "0100000933079696000"

When I create a lead for a customer with values:
| cifKey | directBankingDiallerFlag | contactStaffID | interestedInProduct | contactMethod | immediateClose | noteText | customerFirstName | customerLastName | customerPhoneNumber | diallerTimePeriod | cifNotepadFormat |
| 0100000933079696000 | true | 99978 | Regular Savings | Direct Sales | true | Test Note | Tester | Testing | ABC | Morning | IntrestedIn+Method+Note |

children.description: Create lead capture: | cifKey | directBankingDiallerFlag | contactStaffID | interestedInProduct | contactMethod | immediateClose | noteText | customerFirstName | customerLastName | customerPhoneNumber | diallerTimePeriod | cifNotepadFormat | | 0100000933079696000 | true | 99978 | Regular Savings | Direct Sales | true | Test Note | Tester | Testing | ABC | Morning | IntrestedIn+Method+Note |

testSteps.description: Then I should receive a Validation Error

title: If immediateClose is true, directBankingDiallerFlag must be false
